tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE music_festivals (
    festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    festival_name VARCHAR(255),
    festival_location VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE,
    genre VARCHAR(50),
    lineup TEXT
  )

CREATE TABLE upcoming_music_festivals (
  festival_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  festival_name VARCHAR(255),
  festival_date DATE,
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  city VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE artist_lineups (
  lineup_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  festival_id INT,
  artist_name VARCHAR(255),
  performance_date DATE,
  performance_time TIME,
  genre VARCHAR(50),
  FOREIGN KEY (festival_id) REFERENCES upcoming_music_festivals(festival_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FestivalGenres (
    festival_id INTEGER,
    genre_id INTEGER,
    FOREIGN KEY (festival_id) REFERENCES MusicFestivals(festival_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (genre_id) REFERENCES Genres(genre_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (festival_id, genre_id)
);

CREATE TABLE FestivalArtists (
    festival_id INTEGER,
    artist_id INTEGER,
    time_slot TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (festival_id) REFERENCES MusicFestivals(festival_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (artist_id) REFERENCES Artists(artist_id),
    PRIMARY KEY (festival_id, artist_id)
);
